title: Does Jhin remind you of Sander Cohen (Bioshock) and Dishonored?
body:
I feel like Jhin, personality wise, is very similar to Sander Cohen, with the mad artist psyche and whatnot (and affinity for roses). In the mission you see Sander in Bioshock, you are to kill people and take pictures of them for his art piece, thus finding art in death like Jhin. To me, is Sander Cohen if he was placed into the world of Dishonored, the art style being very similar to me. Jhin and Dishonored gives off a  a sort of Victorian-Steampunk vibe. 
Anyone else think so? 
Here's some reference pics: http://imgur.com/a/bpLe9

replies.body: I was sure i wasnt the only one realized it
corvo attano jihn skin... do it rito
